there is no doubt that the mccain campaign will try to make the case that obama is presumptuous is that automatically racist i don't think so there is a case to be made the presidential seal the big foreign trip the big rhetoric this the world's moment etc now i understand that the claim will be made that any flik towards arrogance is a racist attack but i also hope these discussions are held respectfully look back up at this comment thread it's one thing to accuse me of being biased towards mccain a charge i categorically reject but decline to argue in the comments but then it gets trickier when i get accused of covering up racism that's the difference this is a very explosive topic which is not well suited to the rough rhetoric of a political campaign it can escalate very quickly especially if the campaigns are directing it that's my point we just have to be more careful and respectful when we tread into these waters which we should tread into
